page.title: 01 General Description
page.content: The area is a{mixed farming}region, mainly grass for feeding cattle and sheep. The{crops}grown are oil seed rape,wheat,barley and potatoes. The villages in the area are small,{ {Ingleton}being the largest and the centre of the region.{Hilton,Langton, {Headlam}and {Killerby}are small outlying hamlets. The highest points are north of the Hilton to Morton Tinmouth Road, which rises to{500 feet},and High Hulum and Langton Bank Wood which rises to{400 {feet}. The rest of the area is gently south sloping land towards the {River {Tees}.
